pages.text: Created by breaking the relevant log with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$(), the stripped-away bark contains much wild magic within it.$(br2)Different trees produce different barks, but each contain a considerable amount of wild magic.$(br2)$(info) The amount of bark obtained when breaking logs can be increased with the fortune enchantment.

pages.name: Bark Types
pages.text: Obtained from breaking logs with knives.$(br2)$(info) Other, modded bark types may be available. For a full listing, $(uses:roots:stone_knife)see JEI$().
